turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to place a pizza order at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza order with Bella Luna sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small, ok what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first one, half ham and pineapple, and half sausage. For the second one, I want half mushroom and onion, and the other half cherries. And both of them, I want extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with ham and pineapple half sausage, 1 with half onion and half anchovy with extra cheese is that your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, could you repeat the second pizza toppings again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with half onion and half anchovy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Onion and mushroom. And then the other half, anchovy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 half onion with mushroom and half with anchovy right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok with 2 small pizzas your total comes to 24 dollars, shall we order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, did you get extra cheese on both of them, too. I didn't I don't remember if you said that or not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: correct, let me review your order with you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, 1 with ham and pineapple half sausage, 1 half onion with mushroom and half with anchovy all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Okay. You missed I think you did say that. I just forgot or didn't hear it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I mean that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, its good to confirm with each other, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll do it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
